import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit{ username:string = ''; ngOnInit(): void { this.username = sessionStorage.getItem('username')! } }
